meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to the distance from the tip of the thumb to the tip of the little finger when the hand is outstretched.
meanings.english_definition: A unit of length equal to the distance from the tip of the thumb to the tip of the little finger when the hand is outstretched.

examples.sentence: The length of the table was measured in spithamai.
examples.translation: テーブルの長さはスピタマイで測られた。

etymology.value: From Ancient Greek σπιθαμή (spithamḗ, “span of the hand”).
